morning: Phone ở airplane mode until 8:30 AM
No social media check trong 2h đầu
Use physical alarm clock, không phone beside bed
work_hours: Phone ở drawer hoặc khác room trong deep work
Notifications OFF cho tất cả apps except calls
Use website blockers: Cold Turkey, Freedom

browser_control: Block social media: Facebook, Instagram, TikTok
Block news sites during work hours
workspace_optimization: Use full-screen mode cho deep work

physical_space: Good lighting, plants for air quality
Keep water bottle, avoid kitchen trips
social_boundaries: Use 'Do Not Disturb' sign during deep work
Schedule social time outside work hours
